title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, admin panel) – drop-in replacement for ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for chatting with Ollama models written in Go; keyboard-driven and lightweight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for local code completion in VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; async, streaming, and POJO mapping for all endpoints.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI servers, Discord bots, Next.js apps, fine-tuning tips, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Nginx for HTTPS.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Experimental TypeScript wrapper exposing Ollama as a NestJS microservice with gRPC and REST.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your vault via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with LINQ-style chat builders and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embed endpoints with admin UI and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that answers channel questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter kit exposing Ollama chat, embed, and model management via REST with OpenAI-compatible routes.
